verses.roman:
punaḥ prabhu kahe-āmi tomāra nimitte
dui pustaka āniyāchi 'dakṣiṇa' ha-ite

synonyms: punaḥ—again; prabhu kahe—the Lord said; āmi—I; tomāra nimitte—for your sake; dui—two; pustaka—books; āniyāchi—have brought; dakṣiṇa ha-ite—from South India.
translation: The Lord said, "For your sake only, I have brought two books from South India.
